column1: It was impossible for two boys to keep such an important discovery to themselves
column2: and the shed was soon filled with an eager crowd
column3: all anxious to view the mysterious footprints. The Triple Alliance gained fresh renown as the originators of the scheme by which the disclosure had been made
column4: and it was unanimously decided that the matter should be reported to Mr. Blake.The master cross-questioned Acton and Diggory
column5: but seemed rather inclined to doubt their story."I think
column6: he said, you must be mistaken. I expect the piece of cotton blew away
column7: and the foot-marks must have been there before. I don't see what there is in the shed that should make it worth any one's while to break into it; besides
column9: the thief must have broken it open
column10: and you'd have seen the marks."
